the March for Life at the US Capitol in Washington DC this week, demanding the country's Congress pass legislation ending federal funding of abortion, said a Christian Post report on the Christian Today website. Thank you for braving the cold one more time and saying to the heart of our national government, "We will fight on for life. We will fight on for the unborn and the brokenhearted," declared Republican Congressman Mike Pence at the 38th annual pro-life march.
